subject.geographic: No. 19 Bourbon St., New Orleans, La

mods.abstract: CHILD LOST. FIVE DOLLARS REWARD. -- Strayed from my residence, No. 19 Bourbon street, Sunday afternoon, about 4 o'clock, a very light colored quadroon boy, aged about two years ; light straight hair ; black eyes ; had on a green and yellow dress, with stroped calico apron; black shoes and white stockings ; named ALLICK. N.C. FOLGERC Clothing Store, co., Customhouse & Old Levee ap 17 -- 2t
mods.note: No. 19 Bourbon St., New Orleans, La.

mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
